sn55.2:3.1: 2. Brahmacariyogadhasutta
sn55.2:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.2:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:
sn55.2:5.3: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn55.2:5.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.2:5.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
sn55.2:6.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
